name: South Place Hotel
description: Located where the sophisticated City of London meets the Cultural East End, Liverpool Street and Moorgate Station are on their doorstep; the West End is ten minutes away by tube. During the week South Place exudes stylish business buzz and at the weekend we slip into something more elegant and host Bellini brunches, roof terrace BBQs, live music and cocktail lounges.

name: The Montcalm
description: Superbly situated in the heart of The City of London is The Montcalm at The Brewery London City. This exceptional grade II listed building has been stunningly restored into a luxury five star hotel, whilst preserving the heritage values. The Montcalm at The Brewery London City is the perfect location from which to conduct business, pleasure or both, being conveniently located near Barbican and Moorgate stations and easily accessible from Liverpool Street station.

name: Malmaison
description: Located on the edge of Clerkenwell in West Smithfield, this is one of the most stylish and conveniently located hotels in Central London. London hotels don't get any closer to the great sights and shops than this; you can just about hear the bells ringing in Great St Bart's and the bubble and bustle of Smithfield Market, which is one of the oldest markets in London.

name: Travelodge
description: Conveniently close to several transport links, this picturesque hotel is located in the heart of London and is within easy reach of some of London’s best attractions such as the West End which is famous for its shopping, restaurants and theatres. You’ll find trendy Shoreditch within walking distance of the hotel and the magnificent Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park is just a short journey away, along with iconic landmarks such as St Paul’s Cathedral and the Tower of London just under 2 miles away.
